full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,CHOS SKYONG DREGS PA LCAM SRING 'KHOR BCAS LA MCHOD GTOR 'BUL BA DANG GNYER GTAD ZHES BYA BA BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @004A *, ,(CES CHOS SKYONG DREGS PA LCAM SRING 'KHOR LA BCAS MCHOD GTOR 'BUL BA DANG GNYIS BTANG 'PHRIN LAS BCOL 'DI NI KHAL KHA HA'I MER GEN DBANG GIS SHOG NAS BLO BZANG 'CHI MED BSKUL BA'I NGOR, SH'AKYA'I BTZUN PA AI LA GOG SAN AER TE NI NO YON HU THUG THU YO GA TZA RI MIR GIN PAndI TA THUB BSTAN MKHAS GRUB GYIS SBYAR BA'O, ,'DIS KYANG RGYAL BA GNYIS PA'I RDO RJE THEG PA'I MCHOG GI BSTAN PA RIN PO CHE DAR ZHING RGYAS LA YUN RING DU GNAS PAR GYUR CIG , ,,BKRA SHIS DPAL BAR 'DZAM GLING RGYAN DU BYON, ,DGE'O, ,)
